quotes.quote: It is dangerous to be sincere unless you are also stupid.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The secret of success is sincerity. Once you can fake that you've got it made.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Judge thyself with the judgment of sincerity, and thou will judge others with the judgment of charity.
quotes.author: John Mitchell Mason

quotes.quote: I am not sincere, even when I say I am not.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: Sincerity is the way of Heaven.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: A little sincerity is a dangerous thing, and a great deal of it is absolutely fatal.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
